---
title: "Spatial Data Analysis in R: Lightning Demo!"
author: "Jeff W. Hollister"
date: "11/3/2015"
output: html_document
---

Free and open source software solutions for GIS have come a long way in the last several years as tools to handle file I/O, vector analysis, and raster processing have matured.  Built on top of many of these libraries are some farily well known options and include [QGIS](), [GRASS](), and [PostGIS]().  During this same time, we have seen the rise of the [R Language for Statistical Computing]().
